bioconda.name: checkv
bioconda.summary: Assess the quality of metagenome-assembled viral genomes.

biocontainers.name: checkv
biocontainers.summary: Assess the quality of metagenome-assembled viral genomes.

biotools.summary: CheckV is a fully automated command-line pipeline for assessing the quality of single-contig viral genomes, including identification of host contamination for integrated proviruses, estimating completeness for genome fragments, and identification of closed genomes.

bioschemas.name: CheckV
bioschemas.summary: CheckV is a fully automated command-line pipeline for assessing the quality of single-contig viral genomes, including identification of host contamination for integrated proviruses, estimating completeness for genome fragments, and identification of closed genomes.

galaxy.summary: Assess quality of single-contig viral genomes
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: CheckV is a fully automated command-line pipeline for assessing the quality of single-contig viral genomes, including identification of host contamination for integrated proviruses, estimating completeness for genome fragments, and identification of closed genomes.
